title: Large 1 story, White granite breakfast bar, Covered patio**Lease2Own**
posting_body: Large 1 story, Comal Floor plan, 4bed/3 full bath.
Built-in: 2019.
The living area flows to connect to the kitchen & dining.
The large kitchen has a huge upgraded Kashmir White granite breakfast bar, Kent Moore Cappuccino Brown cabinets & Stainless Steel gas Whirlpool appliances.
Owner's retreat has room for additional furniture, double under-mount sinks, walk-in shower w/ bench.
walk-in closet and linen closet as well.
Covered patio off the back of the home.
This is an example of homes available with Lease with the right to purchase.
